Prompt: How long are pods pending in finance namespace?
Query: "KubePodInventory | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | where Namespace == 'finance' and PodStatus == 'Pending' | summarize FirstSeen=min(TimeGenerated)
column4: Samples=count() by PodName | extend PendingMinutes = datetime_diff('minute'

Query: "KubePodInventory | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | summarize MaxRestarts=max(RestartCount) by PodName
column3: Namespace | join kind=inner (  ContainerLogV2   | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)   | extend IsError = LogLevel in~ ('CRITICAL'
column4: 'ERROR') or LogSource=='stderr' | summarize RecentErrors=countif(IsError) by PodName
column5: PodNamespace ) on $left.PodName == $right.PodName and $left.Namespace == $right.PodNamespace | order by RecentErrors desc"
